video.title: Ruby Gloom
video.synopsis: This kid-friendly animated series follows the adventures of Ruby Gloom, a curiously cheerful girl who lives in a gothic mansion.

episodes.synopsis: Ruby plans a surprise party for everyone but due to a series of mishaps, everyone gets the wrong impression that Ruby's moving out.
episodes.title: Gloomer Rumor

episodes.synopsis: The gang is shocked to discover that Scaredy Bat has never actually flown due to nerves and a "woozy" reaction to heights.
episodes.title: Grounded in Gloomsville

episodes.synopsis: When Doom's odd behavior includes pointing to things that aren't there, Ruby starts to worry she's having a nervous breakdown.
episodes.title: Doom with a View

episodes.synopsis: During a raucous game of hide-and-seek, Mr. Buns goes missing, and Skull Boy interrogates the suspects.
episodes.title: Missing Buns

episodes.synopsis: Iris's latest adventure craze -- coiled spring jumping -- proves that enough is never enough for Iris.
episodes.title: Iris Springs Eternal

episodes.synopsis: The whole house is a hive of activity as everyone prepares for the upcoming science fair.
episodes.title: Science Fair or Foul

episodes.synopsis: When Poe injures his wing, he is soon driving everyone crazy with his incessant demands.
episodes.title: Poe Ranoia

episodes.synopsis: Ruby acts as Frank and Len's manager and suggests they get a girl singer for their upcoming appearance at Gloomapalooza.
episodes.title: Unsung Hero

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Len are writing a rock opera for everyone in the house to star in at the Gloomsville Music Hall.
episodes.title: Quadro-gloomia

episodes.synopsis: It's Club Day in Gloomsville. The gang splinter off to form clubs and prepare for their appearance in the big Gloomsville parade.
episodes.title: Skull Boys Don't Cry

episodes.synopsis: When a cute little bunny lands on Ruby's doorstep, everybody is charmed by its sweet nature. Everybody but Doom, that is.
episodes.title: Bad Hare Day

episodes.synopsis: When names are drawn from a skull to pick a person for a Yam Ween gift exchange, Poe's name accidentally goes missing.
episodes.title: Happy Yam Ween

episodes.synopsis: When Skull Boy thinks he's a descendent of Shakespeare, he spouts his own love sonnets, making Iris and Misery instantly crush on him.
episodes.title: Ruby Cubed

episodes.synopsis: Boo Boo's future at the mansion is on the line when Mr. White and Mr. White get fed up with Boo Boo's practical jokes.
episodes.title: Shaken, not Scared

episodes.synopsis: Once in a blue moon the dreaded Luna Monster appears, and tonight is the night.
episodes.title: Once in a Blue Luna

episodes.synopsis: Thanks to a timely idea from Ruby, Skull Boy invents the amazing eon-hopping Time Vaulter and travels back to the past, hoping to meet his ancestors.
episodes.title: Time Flies

episodes.synopsis: Skull Boy, Misery, Iris, and Poe make the finals of the Gloomsville Town Challenge on the strength of Skull Boy's super intelligence.
episodes.title: Lucky Me

episodes.synopsis: It's the seventh anniversary of the Day Misery Was Rescued from an Ice Floe and Ruby wants to make it extra special.
episodes.title: Misery Loves Company

episodes.synopsis: When Misery is off to visit a relative, the clouds, rain and entire storm systems seem to go with her.
episodes.title: Sunny Daze

episodes.synopsis: Poe has taken up a volunteer position with the Gloomsville Office of Records and is having a heck of a time finding new record breakers.
episodes.title: Broken Records

episodes.synopsis: After Iris and Squig mistakenly crash into Skull Boy's tower, Skull Boy moves in with Poe until the tower can be fixed.
episodes.title: Gloomates

episodes.synopsis: Scaredy Bat is terrified at the prospect of losing his wisdom tooth for fear of losing all his wisdom.
episodes.title: Tooth or Dare

episodes.synopsis: Venus is pulling out her roots! The screenplay writing contest deadline is in two days and she hasn't written a word.
episodes.title: Venus De Gloomsville

episodes.synopsis: Ruby suggests that fearless, thrill-seeking Iris join forces with fun-loving Mr. Mumbles to build the ultimate amusement park.
episodes.title: Seeing Eye to Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Filmmaker Skull Boy sets out to bring his latest script, The Adventures of Skull Kid, to the big screen.
episodes.title: Name That Toon

episodes.synopsis: Skull Boy puts an ad in the Gloomsville Gazette inviting anyone with information on his family members to contact him.
episodes.title: Skull in the Family

episodes.synopsis: The ho-hum of laundry day quickly changes when a secret wall with ancient Egyptian hieroglyphics is discovered behind the washing machine.
episodes.title: Writing on the Wall

episodes.synopsis: At long last Ruby has her dream job ... hosting the Gloomsville World's Fair with such exhibits as Iris's death-defying flying worm stunt.
episodes.title: Déjà vu, Again

episodes.synopsis: Gunther and Uta are spending their vacation at Ruby's house. Ruby and the gang try their best to show the twins a good time.
episodes.title: Ubergloom

episodes.synopsis: Skull Boy, as the great showman PT Cranium, decides to hold a pet talent show.
episodes.title: Pet Poepulation

episodes.synopsis: In a story told only through music and singing, Skull Boy decides he needs to find out who he is once and for all.
episodes.title: Hairless: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In an story told only through music and singing, the gang really miss Skull Boy and try their best at getting along without him (but it doesn't work).
episodes.title: Hairless: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Scaredy Bat quits as Frank and Len's drummer, Ruby sets out to woo him back behind the skins.
episodes.title: Beat Goes On

episodes.synopsis: While working on an experiment, Skull Boy mistakenly blasts the house into space.
episodes.title: Out Of This World

episodes.synopsis: The gang is preoccupied with the latest installment of their favorite radio soap opera.
episodes.title: Forget Me Not

episodes.synopsis: Misery hosts a family reunion and invites all her relatives through the ages.
episodes.title: I'll Be Home for Misery

episodes.synopsis: In this rockumentary, we get a behind-the-scenes and in-front-of-the-lens look at the popular band RIP.
episodes.title: Frank & Len: Unplugged

episodes.synopsis: It's Friday the 13th in Gloomsville, which results in a good luck day for Misery, and a series of mishaps for everyone else.
episodes.title: Disaster Becomes U

episodes.synopsis: It's time to pick up Doom from the kitty spa. What better excuse to take a "family vacation?"
episodes.title: Last Train To Gloomsville: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The train is still running away -- Iris is now riding atop the train in daredevil style and Misery's cough continues despite the bag over her head.
episodes.title: Last Train To Gloomsville: Part 2
